change_password.title: Change password
change_password.desc: Please enter your old and new password. Make sure your password is alphanumeric with at least 8 characters.
change_password.success_desc: Your password has been successfully updated.

forgot_password.title: Reset password
forgot_password.desc: Enter email address for your account
forgot_password.create_password_desc: Please enter your new password and make sure your password is alphanumeric with at least 8 characters.
forgot_password.reset_success_desc: Good news! You are just few steps away to login to MOVE. Click on the button below to login.
forgot_password.reset_fail_desc: Your account verification has expired. Please verify your account again to enjoy full access on MOVE.
forgot_password.send_mail_error: Failed to send email. Please try again
forgot_password.send_mail_success_after: . Click the link in the email to reset your password.
forgot_password.send_mail_success: We've sent an email to { email }. Click the link in the email to reset your password.
